content: pair the breezy canyonlands boho crochet top with a bandeau or cami a pair of well-worn jeans and a free spirit and you ll have yourself the perfect bohemian summer look this lacy boho crochet top has a slightly cropped appearance which makes it bbfs with warm nights under the stars and higher waisted jeans it s made from the bottom up using basic stitches chain single_crochet double_crochet treble_crochet in a four row repeat once you have the the repeat down the shaping of the garment is extremely simple work additional row before the sleeves to make a longer tunic this ad-free printable pdf includes a full written pattern as well as four pages of helpful photo tutorials you ll also receive a stitch chart that clearly outlines how to create the open fan stitch used in this top all images are separate from the written pattern so you can choose to print them or conserve ink this pattern originally appeared here on make and do crew get the free pattern and tutorial at makeanddocrew 1 and view all my free crochet patterns here 2 1 http //makeanddocrew com/canyonlands-boho-crochet-top-free-pattern 2 http //makeanddocrew com/category/knitting-and-crocheting/
